page.title: 15TRANSPORT IN HURST GREEN
page.content: Public transport in this area is limited to bus, train and coach services. Buses run every 15 minutes and run services into and out of{Oxted and the surrounding area. The buses are used by old people and people with out cars. An alternative to the buses is the railway that runs from{Hurst Green}and {Oxted}up to{London}and to{East {Grinstead in the other direction.}The trains are used by commuters, shoppers and school children. The most popular type of transport is cars. The industrial estate has many heavy goods vehicles going to and from it. They use the small surrounding lanes and there are many complaints by local people because the lorries take up most of the roads.
